simitha oowara tharaga bime siduwana wishishtathama peralikara siduwim gonnata ekathu wima walakwa ganime apekshawen indiyawa afganisthanayata erehiwath, ostreliyawa ayarlanthayata erehiwath ada wissayi 20 loka kusalana tharaga bimata piwisethi.kolambaa aar.premadasa jathyanthara krikat kridanganayedi joj belige ostreliyanu kandayama ayarlanthaya samanga 'bi' kotase tharagayatath, mahendra sin donige indiya pila afganisthanaya samanga 'ee' kotase tharagayatath sahabhagi wethi.boho krida lolin me tharagawala jayagrahanaya “wiya yuthu” deyak lesin upakalpanaya kalada wissayi 20 tharagayaka awasan prathipalaya gana anawaki kimen walaki sitimata ostreliyawa menma indiyawada hondin danithi.“mama wiwekayak ganne ee tharagaya iwara wunayin passe witharayi” ostreliyanu puhunukaru miki aathar pawasayi.

me nisa owunge menma parisaraye aarakshawa sandaha wiwidha wadapiliwela rasak kriyathmaka kerenawa.”parisara sanrakshana anukamituwa mangin mihinthalaya, anuradhapuraya ha thanthirimale yana pradeshawala kalikasala bahara kirima ha parisaraya surakima pilibanda upades, ee sandaha awashya bhajana aadiya sapayimath, purawasthu aarakshawata banar, parisara niyamu bhata kandayam wishala sankhyawak, siwil aarakshaka bhatayin, palath palana aayathanawala sewakayin aadi kalikasala ekathu kirima sandahath eewa nisi thanwalata yomu kirima sandahath yodawa thibenawa.parisara adhikariyath kasala bahara kirimata piyawara gannawa.puja bhumi kalapa thula dumwati, mathpan thahanam.wawwala nana aya da nisi upades pilipadimen jiwitha anathuru walakwa ganna lesa illanawa.ek raswana kasala madhyama parisara adhikariya ha mahanagara sabhawa atham palath palana aayathanawala sahayogayen prathichakrikaranaya katayuthu yoda thibenawa.disapathiwaraya pawasu paridi madhyama parisara adhikariye anuradhapura karyalaya mangin kerena katayuthu pilibanda apa wimasuwe wadabalana sahakara adhyaksha aar.em.di. anura mahathagen.”parisara niyamuwan yoda danumwath kirime wadasatahan apa digatama pawathwagena aawa.

ese nam, eya ohuta labena prayojana monawada, ohu sulan sandaha wehesa mahansi wi sita? 5:16 ohu paribhojanaya ohuge mulu jiwitha kalaya thula: andure, ha thawath boho karadara samaga, ha aapada menma duka. 5:17 ithin moka da, me mata honda bawak atha: pudgalayeku ka bi yuthu bawa, saha ohuge shramaye prathipala yuthu, ohu ira yata helime wi athi, dewi ohuta di athi bawa ohuge jiwithaye dina ganana.

mage dewashthanayata ma kudakala sita itha aadaraya karami....mema shantha isidora dewashthanayak nomathi wuye nam mama ada methana natha .mage demawipiyan inpasu ma igenagath pasala ha ekwa badi anek wadagathma sthanaya wuye mage dewashthanayayi.......mema sthanayen ma labu pannaraya kothekdayi kimata ma hata wachana natha .eheth ada ma eka thanakata kotu wi hitiyath ee hitinne ma igenagath haduna waduna mema dewashthanayatath ehi igenwu basatath pinsidu wannataya....kawuran kese ma samaga tharkayanta idiripath wuwada ee sama tharkayakma parajaya karalimata tharam danumak ma hata laba dun mage dewashthanayata mama garakarannemi...sada nayagathiya ..eya ma miyayana thura itu karana bawanam sathyayaki....ma warthamanaye jiwath wanneda .....ma adahana ma garakarana dewiyanta pinsiduwannataya.....eya nowannata mata mese prakasha kirimath sihinayak wannemaya.......................
